channel.title: ~~Need Help please!~~

item.title: ~~Need Help please!~~
item.dc:creator: @warner299 warner299
item.description:
@warner299 wrote:

i have a problem, my server only trains strength xp when you change it to aggresive.

but if you put it to Attack, Defence, or share xp they dont even give xp

pm me, add me on msn brian_warner_11@hotmail.com, or post here please

I THINK THIS IS THE PROBLEM IN THE CLIENT.JAVA

if (FightType != 3) { TotalExp = (double) (100 * hitDiff); TotalExp = (double) (TotalExp * CombatExpRate); addSkillXP((int) (TotalExp), SkillID); } else { TotalExp = (double) (500 * hitDiff); TotalExp = (double) (TotalExp * CombatExpRate); addSkillXP((int) (TotalExp), playerStrength); } TotalExp = (double) (500 * hitDiff); TotalExp = (double) (TotalExp * CombatExpRate); addSkillXP((int) (TotalExp) / 4, playerHitpoints);

that’s all it says it doesnt say attack, def etc.

I’m a begginer coder so please be kind to help me with this little problem.[br][br][size=1]Posted on: April 16, 2008, 05:28:02 PM[/size][hr]Oh my client only works for hamachi but i dont like hamachi,

Can you help on that too if its not hard?

Read full topic
